title: How does mmr work?
body: I'm bronze so ofc idk how, please help. I'm bronze 1 right now and like earlier today i was winning checked op.gg and my mmr was normal. then I lost two games and then my mmr became bronze 3. how much mmr do you lose when you lose and how much mmr do you gain when you win?

replies.body: So I can't go into in depth detail on how MMR works, but I can say you have a grasp of how it does! MMR rises and falls when you win or lose, as you know, but depending on the difficulty you can lose or gain more as you progress or fall. Just a heads up by the way, third party sites are usually pretty off when it comes to MMR as it is a hidden number.
